alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 24 at 7:45AM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor splash-over, beach erosion, and low lying flooding is possible during this morning`s high tide cycle. * WHERE...Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 24/11 AM 10.6 1.8 0.6 7 None 25/12 AM 8.9 0.1 0.5 5 None 25/12 PM 10.7 1.9 0.6 3-4 None 26/01 AM 8.9 0.1 0.4 3 None 26/01 PM 10.6 1.8 0.6 2 None 27/02 AM 9.1 0.3 0.6 2 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 24/11 AM 11.1 1.6 0.6 6 Minor 25/12 AM 9.2 -0.3 0.4 4-5 None 25/12 PM 11.1 1.6 0.6 3 Minor 26/01 AM 9.3 -0.2 0.4 3 None 26/01 PM 10.8 1.3 0.5 2 None 27/02 AM 9.4 -0.1 0.6 1 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
